name: The jeweled axe ''Grimrist'' (2h)
data: It has superb weapon class for its type (impressive in general).
It does fire damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Grimrist's sapphires can drink magical energy.
Grimrist's emeralds can deliver a massive poison blow.
Grimrist's topazes can grant the wielder berserker strength.
